# <a name="how-to-remove-autogenerated-columns-from-a-windows-forms-datagridview-control"></a><span data-ttu-id="8c485-102">Postupy: Odebrání automaticky vygenerovaných sloupců z ovládacího prvku Windows Forms DataGridView</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8c485-102">How to: Remove Autogenerated Columns from a Windows Forms DataGridView Control</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8c485-103">Když je váš <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> ovládací prvek nastaven tak, aby vygeneruje sloupce založené na datech ze zdroje dat, můžete selektivně vynechat některé sloupce.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8c485-103">When your <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control is set to autogenerate its columns based on data from its data source, you can selectively omit certain columns.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8c485-104">To lze provést voláním metody <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection.Remove%2A> v kolekci <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Columns%2A>.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8c485-104">You can do this by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection.Remove%2A> method on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Columns%2A> collection.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8c485-105">Případně můžete skrýt sloupce ze zobrazení nastavením vlastnosti <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Visible%2A> na `false`.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8c485-105">Alternatively, you can hide columns from view by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Visible%2A> property to `false`.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8c485-106">Tato technika je užitečná, když chcete zobrazit skryté sloupce za určitých podmínek, nebo když potřebujete přístup k datům ve sloupcích bez jejich zobrazení.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8c485-106">This technique is useful when you want to display the hidden columns in certain conditions, or when you need to access the data in the columns without displaying it.</span></span>  
  
### <a name="to-remove-autogenerated-columns"></a><span data-ttu-id="8c485-107">Odebrání automaticky vygenerovaných sloupců</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8c485-107">To remove autogenerated columns</span></span>  
  
- <span data-ttu-id="8c485-108">V kolekci <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Columns%2A> volejte metodu <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection.Remove%2A>.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8c485-108">Call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection.Remove%2A> method on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Columns%2A> collection.</span></span>  
  
     [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc#111](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc/CS/datagridviewmisc.cs#111)]
     [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc#111](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc/VB/datagridviewmisc.vb#111)]  
  
### <a name="to-hide-autogenerated-columns"></a><span data-ttu-id="8c485-109">Skrytí automaticky vygenerovaných sloupců</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8c485-109">To hide autogenerated columns</span></span>  
  
- <span data-ttu-id="8c485-110">Vlastnost <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Visible%2A> sloupce nastavte na `false`.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8c485-110">Set the column's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Visible%2A> property to `false`.</span></span>  
  
     [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc#112](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc/CS/datagridviewmisc.cs#112)]
     [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc#112](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc/VB/datagridviewmisc.vb#112)]

## <a name="compiling-the-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="8c485-112">Probíhá kompilace kódu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8c485-112">Compiling the Code</span></span>  
 <span data-ttu-id="8c485-113">Tento příklad vyžaduje:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8c485-113">This example requires:</span></span>  
  
- <span data-ttu-id="8c485-114"><xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> ovládací prvek s názvem `dataGridView1` svázaný s tabulkou, která obsahuje `Fax` a `CustomerID` sloupců, jako je tabulka `Customers` v ukázkové databázi Northwind.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8c485-114">A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control named `dataGridView1` bound to a table that contains `Fax` and `CustomerID` columns, such as the `Customers` table in the Northwind sample database.</span></span>  
  
- <span data-ttu-id="8c485-115">Odkazy na <xref:System?displayProperty=nameWithType> a <xref:System.Windows.Forms?displayProperty=nameWithType> sestavení.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8c485-115">References to the <xref:System?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms?displayProperty=nameWithType> assemblies.</span></span>
